Plot: A group of former Encyclopedia Brown-style child-detectives struggle to solve an adult mystery.
Title: Mystery Team
Writer: D.C. Pierson (screenplay), Donald Glover (screenplay), Dominic Dierkes (screenplay), Dan Eckman (story), Dominic Dierkes (story), Donald Glover (story), Meggie McFadden (story), D.C. Pierson (story)
Actors: Donald Glover, D.C. Pierson, Dominic Dierkes, Aubrey Plaza
